forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers early becoming more intermittent for the afternoon. High near 5C. Winds E at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early becoming more intermittent for the afternoon. High 42F. Winds E at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A shower or two around the area early, then partly cloudy overnight. Low around 0C. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Chance of a shower or two during the evening, followed by partly cloudy skies overnight. Low 32F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy. High 6C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. High 42F. Winds W at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy. Low near 0C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast. Low 33F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain and snow in the morning transitioning to light rain in the afternoon. High 4C. Winds N at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 90%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain and snow in the morning. The rain and snow will become lighter and change to all rain in the afternoon. High 39F. Winds N at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 90%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers late. Low 3C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: A steady rain in the evening. Showers continuing late. Low 37F. Winds W at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy skies. High 6C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy skies. High 42F. Winds W at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy. Low around 0C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds from time to time. Low 32F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly to mostly cloudy. High near 5C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies in the morning will give way to cloudy skies during the afternoon. High around 40F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A mixture of rain and snow showers. Low 1C. Winds light and variable. Chance of precip 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: A mixture of rain and snow showers. Low 34F. Winds light and variable. Chance of precip 50%.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy skies. High 7C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy skies. High near 45F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. Low 2C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. Low around 35F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain and snow showers in the morning changing to rain showers in the afternoon. High around 5C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain and snow showers in the morning. The rain and snow will change to rain showers in the afternoon. High 41F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with rain and snow showers in the evening. Remaining cloudy late. Low 1C. Winds N at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain and snow showers in the evening. Overcast late. Low 33F. Winds N at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 40%.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A mixture of rain and snow showers. High 4C. Winds light and variable. Chance of precip 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with rain and snow showers. High 39F. Winds light and variable. Chance of precip 40%.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain or snow showers in the evening will give way to partly cloudy skies late. Low -2C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with rain and snow showers in the evening. Partial clearing late. Low 28F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 40%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few passing clouds, otherwise generally sunny. High 2C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sun and a few passing clouds. High around 35F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy. Low -4C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. Low near 25F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy early followed by increasing clouds with showers developing later in the day. High 3C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy early followed by increasing clouds with showers developing later in the day. High 37F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with showers. Low near 0C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. Low 32F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.
